articles.description: 'President Biden’s goal was for 70% of Americans to be vaccinated by July 4. Facebook is not the reason this goal was missed,' says Facebook
articles.content: "The data shows that 85% of Facebook users in the US have been or want to be vaccinated against COVID-19," Facebook said in a corporate blog post by Guy Rosen, a company vice president. "President Bi… [+111 chars]

articles.title: Canada’s 2nd dose vaccinations surpass U.S. as Americans grapple with COVID-19 surge - Global News
articles.description: As of Saturday, Canada has vaccinated 48.64 per cent of the population with two doses compared to 48.4 per cent of the American population.
articles.content:
The percentage of Canadians who have been fully vaccinated against COVID-19 has for the first time surpassed the United States.

articles.title: Canadian government approaches reopening border for fully vaccinated Americans - CBC.ca
articles.description: As the government looks to a possible mid-August reopening of the U.S. border for fully vaccinated travellers, people affected are still looking for details, such as whether the U.S. will reciprocate.
